data.message: Hi goodevening, please help me, my account was disabled and i dont know why?, i have many important contacts and important memories there, please help me to recover it, this my first time bad experience on facebook for almost 7 years, please help me thank you. Please reply to my pm.

replies.message: Hi John. If you think your account was disabled by mistake, please submit an appeal. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2ndoMBQ. -Tenaya

I already submit an appeal, i try and try many times, but facebook always saying 

"thanks for contacting facebook, we may reach out to you if we need more info"
